name: Hezrou
description: The Hezrou is a hulking, amphibious demon with a toad-like body and powerful limbs, characterized by thick, warty skin.
memorable: Its foul stench weakens nearby creatures, and its ability to grapple and swallow foes makes it dangerous.
goals: Serve more powerful demons in battle and crush foes with brute strength.
relations: Related to other demons in the Abyss.
environment: Abyssal realms and other dark, chaotic locations.
strengths: Resistance to cold, fire, lightning, and damage from nonmagical weapons; immune to poison.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence limits strategic capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of a powerful bite and deadly claws, with the ability to grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Swallowing enemies, leading to blindness and ongoing acid damage.
senses: Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.
additional_information: Creates magical darkness for tactical advantage.
Quick Leap ability allows jumping without provoking opportunity attacks.
Has a Stench ability that poisons nearby creatures.
test_queries: hulking amphibious demon with a foul stench
chaotic evil creature from the Abyss
demonic creature capable of swallowing foes
